Comment 5 by **tarmigan**: 
Alex,

I just saw your reply to my post to golang-dev.  I think I actually ended up doing it as
you suggested.  Also I think I keep the buffers around for the right length of time in
my package, but maybe you can tell me otherwise.

The code works for some time before it crashes, so it seems like a memory issue (instead
of a complete failure) and I can read and write data on the serial port for a while
before it crashes.

Thanks,
Tarmigan
